entities.description: The racial classification of the respondent or arrestee.
An individual who has been arrested.
The specific racial category assigned to an arrestee.
The count or number of occurrences in the dataset.
Data points that are unknown, missing, or did not respond (DNR).

relationships.description: Associates a respondent with their racial classification.
Associates an arrestee with their specific racial category.
Indicates the number of arrestees within a specific racial category.
Indicates data that is unknown, missing, or did not respond (DNR).
